news

Nov 07, 2025 Our paper “Concept-RuleNet: Grounded Multi-Agent Neurosymbolic Reasoning in Vision Language Models” was accepted to AAAI2026 as an Oral Presentation!
Jun 25, 2025 Our paper “GCAV: A Global Concept Activation Vector Framework for Cross-Layer Consistency in Interpretability” was accepted to ICCV2025! See you in Hawaii!
Aug 27, 2024 I started my Ph.D. in Computer Science at the University of Virginia.
Jul 01, 2024 I received my bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and Technology in 2024 from Tongji University
Apr 15, 2024 Our Projects “BrainBeats” has successfully completed and been awarded as Shanghai Innovation and Entrepreneurship Projects.
Mar 05, 2024 I started my first day of internship at Alibaba, working on the Alibaba Cloud team!
Feb 23, 2023 Our paper “Alzheimer’s Disease Early Diagnosis Based on Resting-State Dynamic Functional Connectivity” was accepted to ICSCA 2023
Feb 23, 2023 Our paper “A Music Labeling Model Based on Traditional Chinese Music Characteristics for Emotional Regulation” was accepted to ICSCA 2023
Sep 18, 2022 Our paper “Conditional Domain Adaptation Based on Initial Distribution Discrepancy for EEG Emotion Recognition” was accepted to MICCAI CLIP 2022
Aug 24, 2022 Received 2nd Prize (National Level) in 2022 Embedded System Design Invitational Contest (Intel Cup).
Aug 05, 2022 One paper about Machine Learning Methods for Obesity Classification was accepted to MLISE 2022.
Jun 27, 2022 I have become a Research Assistant at Shanghai Research Institute for Intelligent Systems Autonomous Systems.
Apr 23, 2022 I joined Tongji Affective Computing Lab and do research with Prof. Xiaoliang Gong.
